website_summaries.verdict: This is a sound choice for consumers who like the fruit infusion option; otherwise it's impractical.
pros: Unique spill-proof design that offers easy fruit infusion
Comes with a 100% lifetime satisfaction guarantee
cons: Not dishwasher safe and not for hot liquids

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this infuser after reading positive reviews but unfortunately it ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this infuser after reading positive reviews but unfortunately it leaks every time I drink out of it, I have water drops all over my lap and chin. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: spring

customer_reviews.title: Band broke in less than 3 months...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this water bottle. It was great; simple press of the button and the cap would spring open/back and hold there while I drank. Unfortunately, the small band that holds the lid open while drinking broke after less than 3 months of use. Now when I drink out of the bottle, the entire lid swings back and hits me in the face. I sent a message to the supplier asking for a replacement or refund and never received a response back. Poor service and a cheaply made product. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle! Awesome features!
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and I love all the features! The infuser feature is AWESOME and works really well. It has a seal on the infuser insert and on the cap so it's leak proof which is fantastic. I love the tick marks on the side to let you know when to drink and how much. The rose gold is more of a pink, but it's cute. I like the sleeve included but I prefer to see the fruit! It looks so cool. I signed up on the website and got the ebook with some great infuser ideas. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Peterson

customer_reviews.title: The looks and well working parts(before using) make me want to drink more water already!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product today! A day early!! I’m so excited to use this, hoping it will encourage me to drink more water! Need to get that summer body in shape! Lol it looks great and seems pretty durable. I questioned why the lid opened sideways when they usually open away from you. I’ll have to get use to that. The sleeve fits great and sits pretty flat on the table. I can still feel the grips on cup and able to use them through the sleeve. If you ourchase this item make sure you enroll in their VIP program to get the warranty on the cup. It’s a full replacement coverage!
customer_reviews.author: AmberB

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product at all. The cap leaks. I don’t want to have to fight with a cap every morning for it to not leak. It’s annoying. Also, the water bottle is shown in the pictures as having a timeline of how much water you should drink and mine doesn’t. I am going to return this garbage water bottle. I don’t know How it gets such good reviews. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Niccmod

customer_reviews.title: If not for infuser size
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bottle and the sleeve and book it came with for infusing ideas. The time marking let me see if I was on track for drinking often enough. So it made me much more aware of how often I drink water throughout the course of a day. The problem was the infuser slits are so large that the mint leaves would get into the main part of the bottle. And that is the worst feeling to be drinking and a piece of wet, breaking down leaf get in your mouth. I ended up sending it back and got a infuser bottle with small slits so the leaves don't slide out even as they break down.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm4Life

customer_reviews.title: Durable, cute, and easy to use bottle for refreshing water!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE everything about this water bottle. I've used it for a few months now and it has not once leaked it lost its seal. The loop on the lid allows for an easy carry with your fingers if juggling other items, the grip is located in a comfortable place, the infuser portion is large and removable so you can use it as a standard water bottle, and it has a timeline goal along the side to motivate hydration. Unlike some other infuser bottles, this one is very easy to remove and clean due to the top lid portion screwing on/off with little tabs to pinch when removing. Highly recommend and it's great with mint and berries!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: The bottle that got me drinking 100oz a day
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST water bottles. I won't use anything else now. This is my third one of these. The first one - after multiple, multiple drops (I'm clumsy) the top finally cracked. The second one I still have and works great but I wanted another one to have at the office so I ordered this one. I love the size of the mouthpiece. It's like drinking out of bottled water. I also love that the mouthpiece stays totally covered and the fun colors. I have used the fruit infuser a few times and it works great! But I mostly use it for plain water. O just love the bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Hall

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 bottles NOT HAPPY..
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could say worth the money but..... it was not.. When you drink it leaks as well as when you rest on its side....I bought 3 bottles NOT HAPPY....:(
customer_reviews.author: miriam c. medina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & tasty!! Minus recipe book
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is AWESOME! I purchased the yellow for my daughter - it was beautifully made & she & I both loved it! I had to buy my own & I purchased the black. Very cool design & all I do is cut up some fresh limes, add a few mint sprigs, fill it up with water and shake it up! Yummy minty lime water! So tasty & yet refreshing! Only drawback was that it was supposed to come with an online recipe book but there’s no information regarding any recipe book. That was disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Mike Riley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Infuser  👏🏻
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So easy to put it together, and I am truly amazed how I enjoy it. The e-book is very easy to get, just go to their website Hydracy.com and register under “ join our VIP Club “ and they send you email and you can download the e-book. I look forward to try the orange cinnamon vanilla recipe, thanks for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ivana

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love?
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy it, it seemed pricey for a plastic bottle. (I tend to prefer stainless.) But I loved the rose gold color, and hoped the infuser, and the time markers Would give me the needed motivation to drink more water. It arrived yesterday, and I love it. I’ve been drinking lime infused water like crazy. I just ordered another one today for my husband! Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: candy

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtful features
customer_reviews.text: Love the water bottle for the following reasons: - wide opening for drinking. - Lockable top so does not leak. - Infuser is great and large enough to get the flavor of the fruit, herbs inserted (mint, etc). - Love having measurements on the bottle to track intake. - Nice touch to have sleeve to keep the bottle cold and hands warm. - Ergonomic indentation on outside of bottle so it fits your hand when drinking.....good for arthritic seasoned citizens Only minor complaint is that insert lid needs some trial and error to screw on. Be patient so it does not get stripped.
customer_reviews.author: Ros

customer_reviews.title: Best Water Bottle of My LIFE
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this. I really love infused water but the bottle I had prior was only 12 ounces. This is nearly triple that, at 32 ounces, and the infused basket is large enough for some good sized chunks of fruit. It’s a good looking bottle, easy to take apart for hand washing and equally easy to put back together. It even has hash marks on the side so you can make sure you’re drinking an adequate amount through the day. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: M. Linford

customer_reviews.title: Awesome infuser!
customer_reviews.text: I love this infuser! I read the reviews & was a little worried about leaks, but I followed all the directions & it works perfectly. I love that it comes with an insulated sleeve so it keeps my water nice & cool. I’ve used this with fresh & frozen fruit and it works perfectly. I even had to wash the sleeve because it got some stain on it & it came out of the washer perfect. I let it air dry so I don’t know if you can safely put it in the dryer. Overall, this is the best infuser I’ve ever owned & if anything happens to it, I’ll be coming back here to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst Fox

customer_reviews.title: I am trying  to drink more water and this was a good brand according to you tube
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought 2 infusion water bottles, my wife decided to try drinking more water and took one .I kept the Hydracy bottle for myself, since I am new ti this infusion water thing I just followed the instructions. I am glad it so easy to clean up and there is a ton of recipes out on You Tube to try . This is a great idea for people who do not drink a lot of water because of bland taste like me. I am impressed how well it cleans up and how well it fits together and the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Tim Hayes

customer_reviews.title: I want more of these!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bottle. I don’t use the infuser insert much because I like plain water, but it works when I do. Love the top! Lid keeps the top from getting dirty. I take this on atv rides, mow the lawn, work...everywhere. Never have a problem with the lip getting dirty, stuff getting in the water or water spilling out. AND the lines in the side help remind me to drink more through the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H

customer_reviews.title: Love this water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle so much I have ordered three more in different colors. I take it everywhere and can switch out to a different color when the others are in the dishwasher (top shelf). The removable sleeve is great too so if you have really cold water you can avoid condensation on your bottle. Great grip around the middle and the fruit tray is large enough to hold several fruits that can last up to 3 refills. Really large but still fits in a standard cup holder in your car. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was getting bored with plain water all of the time and wanted a healthy alternative to sugary drinks. You just put fruit in the middle part and leave it overnight with some water and in the morning you will have a nice sweet drink. It is easy to use and does a great job of giving you all of the flavors of the fruit that you use. It is great for anyone trying to cut back on sodas and sugary drinks but don’t like the taste of water. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: The bottle is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This a simple bottle to use and easy to clean. I have had mine a short time so I am still experimenting with what to put in it. I do think that during the summer months the water will taste great but right now the fruits that I am using are not all that flavorful so there is not much flavor. I may be putting too many different fruits in at one time, but I am just playing at this time. This is a good bottle to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Won't get what you pay for!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is poorly made. I finally got mine out and used it. I used it less than a week and the seal leaks and the rubber band that opens the lid with the button is broken and frayed. Also when I made my purchase I never received my e-book! Very very disappointed!! Will never buy again and will not leave a good review!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie Norris

customer_reviews.title: Tasty water in a handy bottle
customer_reviews.text: The Hydracy bottle is easy to use, easy to clean, and makes good-for-me flavored water with its well-designed infuser. I’m able to place herbs and fruits of my choice in the infuser basket and keep track of the water I drink with the well-defined markings on the outer bottle. The BPA-free bottle is easy to hold with the built-in thumb and finger grips, and the top is easy to access, yet has a secure latch to prevent spills. Good reusable water bottle at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: librigirl

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Makes water yummy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup! If you aren’t crazy about drinking boring water, I highly recommend this! I add frozen, cut up strawberries and pineapple (add one ice cube in the center between the two layers in the infuser). Makes water go from boring to yummy! Really easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I chose this infuser bottle because the core piece is the full bottle, which I really wanted. The core holds a lot of fruit, or whatever you are using. It's easy to use, easy to clean, and I am loving my new bottle. I originally bought because my son is going through a phase where he hates drinking plain water, so I suggested one of these and he wanted to try it, so I ordered one for each of us. I have been drinking 3x's the amount of water I used to because it just tastes so good. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy K. Utzler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd infuser bottle. The 1st one I purchased (from a different company) is what led me to purchasing this one. I can honestly say that when I buy another one, this will be it! The overall quality of this bottle is fantastic; beautiful design. The infuser sets right on top of the bottle and I love that it reaches all the way to the bottom. Once the lid is snapped shut, it doesn't budge. No leaks! Thank you, Hydracy, for making such a reliable product. I ordered the purple one and the color is bright and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Overall
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start off saying I love the lid that locks to always make sure it stays in place is awesome , cleaning is also a breeze , I also chose this for the removable outside cover to keep my drink somewhat insulted but my hands dry , the only thing I may look for I the future is a swirl fruit infuser so that I may add more ice to my drinks , I’m only able to add a few cubes but overall I’m very happy with this purchase , Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was happy with the bottle. After only a few uses the lid and the infuser stripped and will not properly attach. It’s not worth the additional money I will have to pay for postage to mail it back for a replacement. My loss!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Miller

customer_reviews.title: ... for the first time yesterday - and it was great! I don't usually drink anything but water anyway ...
customer_reviews.text: I used my bottle for the first time yesterday - and it was great! I don't usually drink anything but water anyway - but this changes it up and makes it more readily available to ensure I drink more water in the day. The size is great and the fruit chamber holds a lot! I used strawberries and tangerines and it held about 4 cut up strawberries and a cutie. The sleeve helps it to stay cold throughout the day. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Holly D.

customer_reviews.text: The water bottle arrived yesterday and I have been obsessed. I've always had problems with water bottles being too small for my liking, but this water bottle holds up to 32 ounces; which is perfect. The plastic is pretty thick and seems durable so far. The best part of the bottle is the infuser, of course. Its pretty long and almost reaches the bottom of the bottle; this allows your water to always be fused with your fruit which is pretty cool. Also, if you wanted to, you can use the bottle without the infuser. I definitely recommend this water bottle if you want a bottle that functions well, and is pretty affordable (:
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Leung

customer_reviews.title: Its Ok
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and that you can add fruit, these were the attractions when I bought it. Pros: Easy to clean, helps keep track of hydration, attractive, fruit infuser works well Cons: The taste of plastic is really strong, the numbers are off (8 am, 9 am, 10 am, 11 am, 12 am.... it should be 12 pm! After a refill, it starts on the other side 1 pm, 2 pm, 3 pm, 4pm, 5 pm).
customer_reviews.author: Perogies

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water bottle
customer_reviews.text: My wife love's this water bottle. Make it so easy to create your own fruit infused water and give you the ability to change it up at each refill. Quick and easy to clean and keep your beverage cool. If you are looking to make a happy wife and maintain a happy life get her this bottle :)
customer_reviews.author: Russell Christian

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. Since getting this bottle I’ve started drinking way more water. I love that I can infuse the water with fruit using the fruit basket. In days I just want regular water I take the basket out. It’s great for in the go. My family has give this out as gifts since I got mine.
customer_reviews.author: Abby coomes

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to buying another!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second infuser and it's so much better than my first. My first (different brand) used to leak all the time and the realty of it was it really didn't carry that much water through to the fruit. This one, however, has no such issue. The size allows me to actually feel hydrated while getting the clean taste of my citrus blends with every sip. I'm looking forward to retiring the massive amounts of standard Nalgene bottles in my possession and my crappy first infuser for another one of these!
customer_reviews.author: nlmiller18

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Cap
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bottle for the first few weeks, but unfortunately today at work, I lightly shook my drink after filling it and it leaked through the lid and all over my hands, shirt, desk, and the neoprene sleeve. Took the cap off and the inner gasket was not secure. I resecured it and unfortunately it is still leaking. Less than a month old and I can't use it. Loved it while it didn't leak, but unfortunately I can't recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying this bottle with strawberries in it so far! Very well constructed and love the purple color! Keeps my water insulated well with the sleeve but I think in the warmer months i will be adding some ice to it. Easy to carry with the strap and lightweight. You can choose to infuse or not just remove the infusion insert. Price was right too!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A. Olson

customer_reviews.title: I've never drank so much water as I now do with this infuser!
customer_reviews.text: My water is so delicious now. I easily drink 60 ounces a day, which I don't know if I've ever done in my life. My favorite item to infuse is fresh cucumber slices. I also love pineapples. I've used blueberries, blackberries, strawberries, and oranges. All are delicious. I've also added freshly sliced ginger root, although that sometimes slips out. Nothing else ever leaks, though. It's easy to use, comfortable in your hand, fits in cup holders, and attractive (I got the berry color). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TinTN

customer_reviews.title: Faulty catch mechanism
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this for me for christmas and I use it on every day I go to work (3-4x week). Love it overall, size, color, infusion insert. Problem is the locking mechanism. For using it only 2 month the plastic catch has already broken off and now it won't stay closed at all. There goes all my water!. Hard to have at work, when it won't close. Would think it should have lasted longer than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ann PJ

customer_reviews.title: 2 issues with attachments
customer_reviews.text: The bottle & lid work well together, and I like the grip center. However, the water bottle (lid) leaks WHEN/IF the infuser is in place because the infuser cap is slightly higher than it should. So, when the infuser is in place, the lid for the water bottle does not screw on securely (resulting in leakage). Additionally, the insulating sleeve that comes with the water bottle is difficult to maneuver, resulting in a 'lumpy' fit on the bottom and in the center. I do like the product, but I'm disappointed in the infuser 'fit'.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, durable, easy to use/clean
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic infuser bottle! I drink a LOT of water, love infusing with fruit and I even add teas to it. Perfect for the long work days. Great durable design, super easy to clean and love the sleeve option. LOVE the downloadable tips/recipes. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea J Vanik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but hard to disassemble
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this except the part that keeps the cylinder in place is sealed so tight (rubber ring around it) that I can barely ever remove it for cleaning. If it wasn’t so hard to take apart I’d use it every day. The water bottle is great to use without the infuser inside so I still use it as my every day water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome infusing water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Only cons: Doesnt hold 32 oz of water with the infuser full - just an fyi. Wish the slits in the infuser were smaller (more holes but smaller) as Mint doesn't get held in the infuser well. (got a leaf or piece of stem a few sips - oops) Other than that its perfect. I ordered 2 so I always have a water getting cold and flavorful as I drink 3-4 of the equivalent ounces a day.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Michaud

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and how much water it can hold
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and how much water it can hold; however, for me, the circumference of the bottle is to great for my hands to get a good grip on. If the non-skid gripping surface was on the same side as the spout this would be much better and I would keep it. Sadly I have to return it and look for something smaller in circumference. I did also buy one for my daughter-in-law and show loves it. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: You need to be very careful when putting the cap back on or it will leak and this is very easy to not notice until too late. Other than that this product works like a charm! I use it every day, it's easy to clean and the lock feature works well. An excellent and affordable bottle compared to other alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought one for my brother
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much I bought one for my brother. I leave it in the fridge with a lemon and/or lime wedge squeezed in and then pour into a glass to drink. Cleaning is much easier since it only sees fresh water and fresh juice. I have also added other fruits. Makes water very refreshing with a hint of fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C. Muse

customer_reviews.title: Good bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I get tired of drinking plain water and like some flavoring so I love being able to infuse any fruit I want. I like the bigger bottle so I make sure I am drinking enough water. It has not leaked and the grips and hook on it are nice when holding or carrying. It even comes with an insulator pouch to keep water cold longer. It comes apart for cleaning which I like and I can get a cloth in there too clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome infusion water bottle
customer_reviews.text: This cup has been awesome I have used it since the day I got it it has made drinking my water very easy. The infusion container is ver easy to use and hold a lot of fruit or what ever you plan to put in there and it is all the way through the bottle not just at the top it has an easy grip so you can easily hold it. And the mouth is very wide great for cleaning I have zero complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: Pass by, keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Pass by this and keep looking. Pros: Cool fancy colors Awesome sleeve cover Cons: No room for ice No room for a straw Dribbles down your chin due to over sized drink hole. Bulky to carry around. Hard to get the infuser portion out as it is a very tight suction so it’s a struggle every time. Now I have a $17 over priced water bottle I will never use. You live some you learn some.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle, it’s very high quality and doesn’t mean. It comes with a sleeve to help insulate your drink. It’s fun to come up with different fruit combos to flavor the water, so far my favorite is fresh pineapple slices and mint.
customer_reviews.author: kim5875

customer_reviews.title: Best water-bottle
customer_reviews.text: Since receiving this I have only used this. The lines on it helps monitor where I need to be at with my water consumption. It's so easy to hod and to carry. The infuser net is the perfect size and has help make my water exciting and full of flavor with new combinations of fruits, herbs, and veggies. I would recommend this water bottler to anyone and everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: KHM2011

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect, as I don't have to refill too often
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is very convenient for me at work. I can carry it with one finger as I travel from classroom to classroom throughout the day, as my schedule is in flux. The size is perfect, as I don't have to refill too often. The fruit in the infused holds up very well. So far, it is holding up to be leakproof/spillproof, but if you are clumsy and tip it, when you do open it, you could dribble a little bit ... pure science. I like the cooler sleeve, but find it a a bit awkward to get past the bottle grips. I'm very pleased with this purchase, especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I have been wanting
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these for a long time now. I was so picky when choosing the right one when it finally came down to buying one. I ran into this one and bought it. Honestly, I LOVE IT. It has a great grip, easy to use, easy to wash, and it has a good style to it. The only thing I did not like about this product is that the bag holder for the bottle smells. The odor is very strong and it smells like plastic. It's hard to explain but I will be putting it in the washer. Other then that, the bottle itself is great!
customer_reviews.author: Lexa =)

customer_reviews.title: No better Infuser!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this infuser. It is so pretty and I get compliments and asked about the inside every time I am out! It only takes a little while for it to flavor your water, so if you make your water before you get ready you will have it good to go when you leave. The only problem I have is that everyone in my house wants to drink out of MY water bottle, so I have trouble keeping track of how much I've actually drank. Time to get everyone their own color I guess!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these as gifts. My niece, a Medivac nurse, put hers to use the very next day and was thrilled. She cannot leave loose items in the helicopter, so the sleeve with loop that she could clip to her flight suit was a great feature. She confirmed there were no problems with leaks, and the infuser insert was easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lois F. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Decent Price, But...
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a pretty simple water bottle. The slip cover is nice since it keeps the sweat away but it doesn’t help keep water cooler. Honestly, the fruit and veggies still get through the basket in the middle so you could just put additives in a regular water bottle and have the same effect. Not a bad product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kat O.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep its cool!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this, but I was very disappointed. I love putting lemon and raspberries in my water, but I also need lots of ice. There is no way to fill it with ice and it doesn’t stay cool for long. I haven’t been able to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ribeza

customer_reviews.title: Go to Walmart buy one less than half the price of this
customer_reviews.text: There are a ton of fruit infuser water bottles out there. I purchased this last minute for a gift i needed quickly. There is no reason to spend this much money on any type of water bottle, the price is outrageous and definitely not worth it. Go to Walmart and pick one up for under $10-they are the same thing!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Pop top feels slightly fragile and might break easily.
customer_reviews.text: I love the bottle and how easy it is to clean it. Very easy to open and close. The only concern I have is the plastic pop top. I feel like the pop top is slightly fragile and will break easily if I’m not gentle with it. Other than that its a great product for infusing your water.
customer_reviews.author: Gurlchris808

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle for the office
customer_reviews.text: I run from meeting to meeting all day and it was hard to carry a water bottle along with my laptop, notebook and phone. This one is great because it’s completely leak and spill proof and I can easily carry by hooking the strap onto just one finger when I don’t have a free hand The cover eliminates condensation so no more puddles of water where I put it down and I love that is can be machine washed.. Bottle is Easy to open and close and easy to take apart and clean and the infuser makes me drink more because I can experience with different options. Very well designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: I've had it less than a month. It has ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it less than a month. It has never been put through the dishwasher. It's leaked since day 1 and now it doesn't seal at all. I decided to recycle the bottle and just keep the insulation sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: dannielle schmitt

customer_reviews.title: very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a great bottle for me. After a long search I found this one and totally satisfied with this purchase. Its big enough and my favorite part is that I can put all the fruits inside its amazing. the quality is great as well so I would recommend this item for purchase. What I love is color which is purple! its amazing
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great infuser bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bottles for my mom and I for first time infusing. I now use it everyday. The flavor it brings makes drinking water that much more enjoyable. Love the Kong’s basket in it and the ergonomic grip! I shake it up and it hasn’t leaked yet. Some of the bottles caned with the threads still rough and made for difficult opening and closing for the caps, but after a wash worked out well. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.... good looking bottle. Nice color.
customer_reviews.text: You definitely will need the sleeve on your water. The bottle leaks pretty bad. Lock feature works great. My yeti is still my favorite but they don't have an infuser so you win there. Pretty good bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids and I like the fact they are drinking fruit infused water in lieu of sugary juices and sodas. I like that it shows the measurements and time so you know what you are drinking at a certain time table. It’s secure and doesn’t leak which is a plus since the kids take their water bottle to school.
customer_reviews.author: Anita S.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product! It is exactly as described, shipping was super fast! The flavor lasts until very last drop and it’s very easy to clean! The sleeve keeps my water cold for HOURS which I love because I can’t stabd warm water. The color of the bottle is so bright and vivid I bought the deep purple it looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Paige Elizabeth Mauss♡

customer_reviews.title: EH.... not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not what i expected. I have tried to make several different infused waters using many different ingredients and none of them worked. They turned out sour and not wel flavored. I thought if I used sweet fruit there would be a sweeetness to the water however it tasted very off. Not sure if I will use this one at all. I’d like to return it however I threw out the box
customer_reviews.author: Calinan

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new bottle. I am taking it with me during the day when I run errands and work out. Beautiful carrying case with a strap makes it easy for toting around. It fits into my car’s cup holder as well. It makes me drink more water!!
customer_reviews.author: Glynis Albright

customer_reviews.title: Infuser Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle for hydrating. Can add a variety of fruits and vegetables to make water drinking enjoyable. The bottle is easy to clean and the sleeve makes it easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Freddyd

customer_reviews.title: Moldy/mildewed sleeve
customer_reviews.text: The above photo is what the "Sleeve" looked like within 3 months of the purchase in 02/2019. The actual water bottle has worked well. it's the 2nd one I had. But I'm definitely disappointed in the sleeve. I usually keep as much ice and water in the bottle. The sleeve also seems to get more moist/wet than the one I had previously. Becky
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: After two days, I am completely satisfied with this bottle. Because the chamber for the fruit extends almost to the bottom of the bottle, you get flavor down to the last drink. The lines on the side indicating the time of day are a big help in keeping me on track with my water consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R. Good

customer_reviews.title: Spared no detail!
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is everything! Functions exactly as described, is easy to clean, is pretty to look at, and gets me drinking more agua. No detail was spared making this a new precious commodity. Going on my gift ideas list for future presents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Infusion Bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth bottle I have bought and I love making lemon, mint, ginger, cucumber water. I have multiple bottles so I can make a bottle at night to steep overnight. That way, I can drink this nourishing water as soon as I wake up in the morning-- great for gut health! I have given them as gifts and I always have one that is drying from cleaning and one I am steeping.drinking from. My only drawback is that even with soapy water, the actual bottle does develop a film on the inside surface over time.
customer_reviews.author: rob hamm

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bottle!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! I was so excited to get this today! Super fast shipping, bought less than 24 hours ago! Cleans and assembles easily. Love the sleeve you get with this one! Most other infusers don’t come with this little bonus. GREAT product, thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: MamaOfManyMD

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bottle for my 8 year old who absolutely loves fruit infused water. We live in a smaller town, so we can't usually find stuff like this. So I surprised her by ordering one. It came before estimated date and was a lot bigger than I expected. She has brainstormed finding so many different fruits to add to it. Awesome water bottle for such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M

customer_reviews.title: Broke easily
customer_reviews.text: It did not last long. The top part got broken when my cat knocked it down from the counter. This is the second bottle we had and broken. Won’t buy it again. It’s easy to clean and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Infuser bottle
customer_reviews.text: I like this bottle, but it slipped out of my hand and the lid broke at the hinge. You really cant use after that because the liquid will come out. Needs a better lid construction. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: crystal daubner

customer_reviews.title: Easily drink your 8 cups a day!
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is 33 oz, which makes it easy to drink the mandatory 8 cups of water a day. Just drink two of these bottles and done. Furthermore, the fruit infuser makes the drinking more exciting and also refreshing. The bottle has a good closure which insures it doesn't drip when carried around, and a comfortable grip on the two sides to easily hold it with bare fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Weiser

customer_reviews.title: love it. I h ave to figure out how ...
customer_reviews.text: Got my Hydra cy Fruit infuser water bottle and I'm loving it. Gave the other one to my sister-in-law as a gift and she is excited to use it too. I've used oranges minus the rinds, and a cinnamon stick, love it. I h ave to figure out how to add ice I love ice cold water. I am planning on adding it to yhe infuser section when I'm at work on Mondaty. The have crushed ice. I've cut up oranges, limes and lemons for tomorrow's water. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sleach

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle! I've been looking for a decently priced infuser, and stumbled across this. It works wonderfully! The infuser insert is a great size, and allows for a good amount of fruit/herbs/etc. It comes apart easily for cleaning, but is still very sturdy. I love it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Love this water bottle - we have one for everyone in the family!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, love the reminder of how much water I should be drinking by hour. Love the grip and the metal clasp to ensure less spillage. This is my second one I reordered it b/c it works well for me. I dropped and broke the last one on the bottom where the small indent is. Two things I wish were different - I like the cozy that comes with it but it covers up the hourly reminders. Also, there is an error on the hourly reminders. The hours go from 8 - 9 - 10 - 11 am and the next line should read 12 p.m. but it reads 12 A.M. instead.
customer_reviews.author: Zune tunes fool

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I received this water bottle 2 days after I ordered it! Sturdy packaging kept the bottle in great shape. I’ve been putting blueberries in the fruit infuser and it does make the water taste better. So far so good. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M

customer_reviews.title: 12 PM not AM
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bottle. I love the color, the seal, and the time. Helps me to ensure that I am on top of my stuff. The only problem with the bottle is the time. After 11 am, it says 12 am. I believe it is supposed to be 12 pm since you cannot skip from 11 in the morning to 12 midnight. To be perfectly honest, that was the one thing that was making me hesitate to buy it. You may want to change that. Just to be as accurate as possible !! Thank you for an awesome product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jane I.

customer_reviews.title: Love this water bottle but it does leak
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle has everything, easy to read measurement on the side, a insulated sleeve to keep your water cool, a separate area to put your fruit (strawberry-lemon is my fav). I love everything except that it leaks. I placed it on the seat of my car since is doesn't fit in the cup holders and when I came back out, it had leaked half the bottle on the seat (VERY disappointing). I still gave it four stars because it is a great bottle, just don't lay it down.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I love this bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle! I HATE plain water, but with the full size infuser, you can put add quite a bit of fruit. The only thing I do not like is the lid doesn't twist on easily. Sometimes it isn't on correctly and I wear the water. I am sure this will work itself out once I have broken it in. Today I added frozen strawberries and blueberries after leaving it in the frig through the night so I could grab it on my way to work. YUM! I am drinking three times the water I was drinking before buying this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Neel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sports bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is a really healthy way to live. I drink water everyday, but using this bottle makes everything taste 100% better. It's easy to use and is well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: MUDDA

customer_reviews.title: This infuser is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these infusers—one as a gift for my sister and one for myself, and we both agree it’s a great product. It’s easy to operate, easy to clean, with plenty of room for fruit and herbs in the infuser basket. The size is perfect and your biggest challenge will be choosing a color! It’s been fun to try out different food combinations and amounts and I am definitely drinking more water and less diet/sugary soda. So far I’ve enjoyed infused lemon, cherries, mint and cucumber, in various combinations. Looking forward to kiwi, oranges, melons and berries.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love my bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I am recently pregnant and was having a hard time increasing my water intake - until I used this infuser. There are endless ways to infuse your water and each glass throughout the day is more and more potent. I like the lock feature to prevent my toddler from spilling everywhere :).
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect if you struggle with getting your daily water in take.,The fruit helps and there is a time etched on the bottled to remind you when to drink. There is a carrying sleeve too.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Buy with Caution
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is very nice but the Neoprene holder sucks!! I received this yesterday and took it for lunch today. Due to the condensation of the iced tea, the outer Neoprene cover got totally wet and wet some of the items in my bag. I was not happy at all with this This bottle needs an insulated cover so that the items in the lunch bag do not get wet!! I am really thinking about returning this item. Like I said, the bottle is nice but the cover needs to be insulated.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Best to read instructions first. Once I read that the lemon, orange etc peel will over several hours make the water bitter-then the water tasted better. Like the protective skin that keeps moisture inside so my bag doesn't end up wet when the water is cold. Good price-paid the same for a friends bottle and it was just the bottle.Like the follow up emails from the company checking to be sure you are a satisfied customer and offering suggestions on how to use your bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Nash

customer_reviews.title: This appears to be a quality product.  Delivered quick.  Haven't used it yet.
customer_reviews.text: I believe I will love the product, however I did NOT receive the recipe book. I ordered this particular infuser because the description said I would get the recipe book. the infuser is not only beautiful looking, but the water tastes goo with a couple recipes I've gotten from off the internet. Orange juice, ginger, and blackberries has been a very tasty combination. Incourages me to drink water. Hope DeArmond
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great on the go container.
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well leak proof and durable, dropped a few times and held up so far. Only reason a for a 4 star to clean is because taking the insert to clean the inside requires to pull hard and I can see this breaking eventually, besides that it’s a perfect container to carry for travel, work, or just on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Nazario Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Bottle To Help You Stay Healthy
customer_reviews.text: Finally a water bottle that fits all my needs! I’ve been terrible at drinking enough water throughout the day but with the time lines on the bottle, it helps me to stay hydrated. It’s a product that is easy to clean, doesn’t sweat because of the sleeve it comes with, and is durable. It hardly leaks, but if it does, it most likely is because the plastic ring in the lid got loose. Just make sure the ring is in the lid tight and you are good to go with no leaks! This is by far the best water bottle I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Celine

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can add fruits to this to change flavor of water. Ice melts fast in it but it’s very convenient and the no sweat cover helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: GradStudentSingleMomLife

customer_reviews.title: This was a great choice
customer_reviews.text: I love this infuser. After researching different infusers i decided to try this one. I choice this one because the sleeve it comes with, the infuser insert is longer tube, I can put one cut up lemon in it, and the flat bottom is a smart idea. My only issue was the first time i used it, it fell and the clip broke. A little flimsy piece plastic holding a heavy bottle of water. I would have bought the pink one if it was the same price as the charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Aimeeintx

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect bottle. I have never infused fruit
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect bottle. I have never infused fruit... I will be doing that after next grocery store trip. I am using it for lemons and mint right now--I grow lots of mint. it can be used w/out the infuser also...it doesn't spill. the only negative is that the outer sleeve is a little difficult putting on because the bottle has a rubber grip on it that stops the cover from going up
customer_reviews.author: David miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle! I love how much fruit I can put in it. I also loved that it came with a sleeve. Am currently buying a second as a gift for my Mom.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby C.

customer_reviews.title: Does not leak!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my new hydracy infuser! I’ve already tried a few different infusions and I’m so happy! I was on the fence because of reviews saying the bottle leaks; here’s my two cents- first, the drop in infuser has a rubber gasket on it so be sure to push it down all the way for a tight seal. Second, use the little latch when not in use so the mouthpiece seal is tight. I’ve been using the bottle for a week and have had zero leak issues. Time to add some different colors to the rotation!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Bober

customer_reviews.title: Neat!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my mom. She loves drinking water and she also loves fruit. So I figured this would be perfect. It’s a Christmas gift so after she gets a chance to use it, I can update the post. It came packaged nicely. Comes with a matching sleeve. So neat
customer_reviews.author: Dez Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. Love the color, easy to clean, great design. The only thing I wish was different is the holes in the infuser. I wish they were smaller so less floaties from the fruit I’m infusing could get through. Otherwise, it’s just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dmama

customer_reviews.title: Best Fruit Infuser Water Bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I purchased 3 of these bottles (2 for me and 1 for my mom). This bottle has been a life changer!!! I’ve gotten many compliments at work on the water bottle. It’s convenient, eye/catching and most of all hydrating/tasteful! I don’t plan to leave home without this bottle for now on. Another plus is the time ticks on the back of the cup to keep you on track throughout the day. If you are hesitant about purchasing this bottle, don’t waste any more time. This bottle will be the one for you. So far I have no cons about the bottle. I will do another update in a month or so. Overall, a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki B

product_meta.title: Hydracy Fruit Infuser Water Bottle - 32 oz Sports Bottle - Insulating Sleeve, Time Marker & Full Length Infusion Rod + 27 Fruit Infused Water Recipes eBook Gift - Your Healthy Hydration Made Easy
feature_bullets: ✅ ENJOY DRINKING HEALTHY: large 32oz capacity and full length infuser basket for increased flavour till the last drop, drinking water has never been so tempting! Thanks to our new timeline feature, you will easily track your daily water intake and adopt a healthy hydration habit proven to increase your energy level, facilitate weight loss, detox and feeling rejuvenated!

✅ NO SWEAT & COOLER: the Sleeve Edition infusion bottles come with their own sweat proof insulative cover. Say Goodbye to condensation which can potentially create a mess in your carry bag and say Hello to your fruit infused water staying deliciously fresh at least 50% longer!

✅ SAFE & SIMPLE TO USE: Built with sturdy premium BPA free eco-friendly Eastman Tritan, your bottle can be used and reused safely by everyone adults or kids. The metal ring latch on the flip top ensures the bottle is securely sealed and 100% leakproof. Cleaned easily in 1 minute, spend more time experimenting with all the delicious recipes included in your free Starter Guide eBook.

✅ SMART & STYLISH DESIGN: easy to carry in backpack pocket or using extra convenient carry handle. Special fitted grips on both sides for a more comfortable and secure handling. Flip top Lid give you instant access to your infused water, large capacity reducing refilling needs, fits most car holders, 2-in-1 just remove the infuser and you have a nice sport bottle. Ideal for gift, why not buy another one for a friend or family member? Get ready to receive plenty of compliments!

★ YOUR SATISFACTION GUARANTEED ★ We are so sure you will absolutely love your bottle that it comes with a lifetime satisfaction guaranteed: if for whatever reason you are not absolutely 100% thrilled by your infuser, we will refund or replace it, no question asked! Included also are instructions on how to download your free Infused Water Starter Guide & Recipes eBook. Kick-start your healthy habit and order your awesome bottle risk-free NOW!
